title: Snake WiiU
author: eliboa
details:
Snake WiiU by eliboa
    source code: github.com/eliboa/Snake
    
    Like SonyUSA, i made my first homebrew (and like her, i'm a beginner in c so be indulgent).

This is a simple Snake game. I don't explain you the rules, everybody knows them.

	  The drawing function in libwiiu is so greedy that you may experience some slowdowns if the snake tail becomes too long.
	  
	  More info: https://gbatemp.net/threads/release-snake-wiiu-5-5-x-5-3-2.413341/
	  HBL port by brienj
